description:
Reid is a shy, soft-spoken 22-year-old who gets nervous around pretty girls.
"They have to make the first move," he said.
"Why is that?"
"It's hard for me to get up the courage," he replied. "You know, to go and talk to them."
"I bet you'd have a lot of luck if you just went up to them and smiled," I said. "You have a cute smile."
I can't imagine a girl not responding to Reid's smile. It's kind and sincere and adorable.
Unfortunately, one of the best things about Reid is something you wouldn't know about in a casual social situation.
He blows big loads!
title: Reid
